bibl.title: Christians Among Jews and Gentiles: Essays in Honor of Krister Stendahl on His Sixty-Fifth Birthday
bibl.seg: Pearson Birger A., Christians and Jews in First-Century Alexandria.
George W. E. Nickelsburg and George W. MacRae (Edd.), Christians Among Jews and Gentiles: Essays in Honor of Krister Stendahl on His Sixty-Fifth Birthday = HThR 79 (1986) pp. 206-216.
